title: Helping Your Children Build Healthy Relationships
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. Kara Powell
itunes:summary:
It's good for teens to know you're there when they need guidance. John and Danny offer tips for having meaningful conversations with teenagers.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Growing With" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2020-12-15?refcd=1028505

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/helping-your-children-build-healthy-relationships/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
